PARISH WATSON & CO INC                                44 East 57th Street
Works of Art                                                                New York
CABLE ADDRESS PARWAT NEW YORK

                                                                                 April 8/25

To the Art Club of Chicago,

  Chicago Ill

My dear Sirs
I beg to enclose an invitation folder and certain press cuttings descriptive of my important collections of Persian Fine Arts which I am now showing in these galleries. If any of you happen to be in New York, I hope

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.
Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.
Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

2

you will visit this Exhibit. I desire to show these collections in the Galleries of your Club after closing here. These rare & beautiful objects represent generations of research & devoted effort & are far above any objects of their kind which have been acquired or offered for sale by dealers. The miniatures con-

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.
Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

PARISH WATSON & Co INC
Works of Art
CABLE ADDRESS, PARWAT, NEW YORK
115 East 57th Street
New York
3
tain rare examples by Bihzad, Reza Abbasi & other masters who have signed their work, & the illuminated manuscripts are of the finest. The textiles, weaves, potteries as well as the important collection of lacquer painted boxes & mirror cases are far above similar

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

4
objects ever brought to or shown in this country. I am sure you will offer your members a great & rare treat by having us exhibit these at your Club, as it is my aim to dispose of most of these things, I make no difficult conditions in offering them to be shown. In other words, it will cost you nothing

PARISH WATSON & Co INC
Works of Art
CABLE ADDRESS, PARWAT, NEW YORK
115 East 57th Street
New York
5
to have us bring them except the preparing & sending out of invitation cards & doing the usual publicity which is done in connection with other exhibits shown.
I hope you will be good enough to telegraph me if you wish to show this exhibit, as in that case we will not

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

6
make any other arrangement after closing here. 
I forgot to state that I will be pleased to offer to your club ten per cent of all  sales to be made at your galleries during the Exhibition. This will cover the expenses of invitation cards, publicity etc. 
Kindly send a reply at your earliest convenience
Yours sincerely
Ali Kurli Khan N.D.?

element_texts.text: Completed

PARISH WATSON & Co INC
Works of Art
CABLE ADDRESS, PARWAT, NEW YORK
115 East 57th Street
New York
P.S. 
In case all of your galleries are not available, it would do to allow us as much space as you can dispose of; as in any case, we can make a lovely exhibition.
I enclose stamped envelope with the request that you return to me the press cuttings which I enclose.
Sincerely yours
Ali Kuli Khan N.D.

PARISH WATSON & Co INC
Works of Art
CABLE ADDRESS, PARWAT, NEW YORK
115 East 57th Street
New York
April 14/25
The Art Club of Chicago
Chicago, Ill.
Dear Sirs:
Will you kindly reply to my letter of recent date regarding my collections of Persian Fine Arts, I am enclosing

element_texts.text: Completed

April 29/25
707-5th ave.
New York, N.Y.
To the director
The Art Club of Chicago,
Chicago. Ill.
Dear Sir,
I answered your yesterday's telegram as follows;--
"Conditions accepted. Arriving with exhibition about May 15. Letter follows";
Will you kindly prepare about four showcases in which potteries, manuscripts & lacquer could be exhibited. Let them be flat together with standing ones if possible. Then a few tables of different shape & size are needed. I shall have my nephew with us to help. but one or two men of

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.
Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.
Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

yours should be available to help hanging tapestries etc. Mr. Kelley of the "Art Institute of Chicago" was to see me yesterday & he greatly admired my miniatures & other things, of which he had time to see only a few. We will have a wonderful exhibition in your galleries. The folder to be printed & sent out by you should read more or less like the one sent out by Parish-Watson, but please do not reproduce the crown.
The two typed pages which I enclose should form the text of the folder, to be printed & sent out in due time before the opening, as I arrive on the 15th, there will be time to arrange the Exhibit for the opening on the 8th or so.
I shall send you material for the catalog later. Please write me if there's anything more to find out. Very sincerely yours
Ali Kuli Khan N.D.

HULL-HOUSE
600 SOUTH HALSTED STREET
CHICAGO
Feb. 14, 1925,
Dear Miss Roulier,
Now that the Arts Club has quarters of its own I am wondering whether your interest in our children's work, so kindly expressed last year, might lead you to consider an exhibit of it there. 
Miss Loeb was unfortunately laid up all the autumn & till after Christmas, but is now back at her work. She

element_texts.text: Completed

22 WEST 9 STREET
NEW YORK CITY
Dear Mrs Bauer
Spoke to Mrs Palmer last summer about a possible chance of showing some decorative water colors of mine at the Arts club in Chicago. It was Mrs Palmers suggestion that I write to you with the hope that I might in some way show you my things with that in mind - or have some one you trust in New York pass upon them.

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

I can send you such press notices as I had from an exhibition of oil paintings at the Ehrich Galleries on 5th Ave two years ago. I had very good luck with the critics for a first show--and am now most anxious to show a unclear of these water colors. 
They are framed on colored mats and fit remarkably well into the average modern interior - I have done them with that in mind. and I think it is possible that the type of work, so

Caption-Abstract: Use the link to the finding aid for a fuller description of collection contents that explains the use of the name and subject terms appearing in this catalog record.

element_texts.text: Completed

22 WEST 9 STREET
NEW YORK CITY
handled, would be new and interesting. 
May I hear from you what you believe is possible if it is not too much bother? I feel confident that I can arrange for them to be shown in Buffalo at the Garret club either before or afterwards - so it all might work out very well.
Sincerely yours
(Mrs) Grace A. Holden.
October 15, 1925

Nov 6th
Secy of Arts Club.
Chicago. Ill
I am sending today by Express my miniature, done recently by Miss Enid Stoddard - which she requested for her exhibition this month. Trusting it reaches you safely I am sincerely yours -
Mrs. Theodore T. McManus.
over
